Overview

ScorecardsQueryBinder contains methods for accessing scorecards and scorecard summaries.

Constant Summary collapse

SCORECARD_DETAIL_FRAGMENT =

A default scorecard detail fragment.

<<~'GRAPHQL'
  fragment ScorecardDetail on Scorecard {
    id
    name
    description
    canEdit
    nextMilestone {
      id
      name
      daysToTarget
      description
      targetDate
    }
    services {
      totalCount
      edges {
        cursor
        node {
          name
        }
      }
    }
    objectives {
      totalCount
      edges {
        cursor
        node {
          id
          name
          description
          docs
          requirements {
            totalCount
            edges {
              cursor
              node {
                id
                name
                description
                docs
                maxScore
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
    milestones {
      nodes {
        name
        description
        targetScore
        targetDate
        daysToTarget
      }
    }
  }
GRAPHQL

#update_score(**kwargs) ⇒ Response

Update a score for a scorecard on a given service.

Parameters:

  • context (Hash) —

    (optional) Added context to add to the request as headers

  • scorecard_name (String) —

    The name of the scorecard

  • service_name (String) —

    The name of the service to score

  • objective_name (String) —

    The name of the objective

  • requirement_name (String) —

    The name of the requirement

  • score (Integer) —

    The new score

  • notes (String) —
